text: 6.23: Stt 2.17; Ro 2.7; 5.12; 5.15; Ze 1.15; 1 Pi 1.4Tɨvi mbatɨgi, nta vhezar wari won ŋaara gumgi ga ndɨɨi. Mba vhez khare, vhɨzi. Fhe Bakɨme, ana fhura kha bigɨnan nza nɨɨŋgi. Mba bigɨn khare, zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ. Mba bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ nza wo Bakɨme Zisas Krais muuŋgi ŋaara panan ana ndigi.
